snippet.title: Magic Traps Trailer Available in Playstore
snippet.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HooGames.MagicTraps

Magic Traps takes you into an extraordinary puzzle Jump'n'Run adventure. There are easy and difficult challenges in the game. Do not be fooled by the ease of the first level, the higher the level, the more difficult it is in Magic Traps. Those who think it's too easy to master the 26 levels will be able to prove their skills in the Hardmode (no checkpoints and the first levels are a lot harder). MagicTraps has no points, only magic, in every easy level You get a point for each created level a point in hardmode it looks a little different the higher the level the more magic. Magic Traps will keep you tied for a long time.

Features in Magic Traps:
- 26 levels
- Easy and hardmode
- Retro graphics
- Different characters you can buy with magic

As always with every game of Hoogames, all inquiries and bugs will be fixed as soon as possible. Have fun with Magic Traps.

Enjoy my games free2Play...I would be happy about a review

https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Hoogames
